section.title: Managing Top Level Domain Names
section.para: Designate allows management of the Top-Level Domains (TLDs) that users are allowed to create zones within.
For example, itâ€™s simple to only allow users to create zones that end in .com..
By default, all TLDs are allowed in Designate, this is ok for most scenarios.

section.para: TLDs can be deleted, just like an other resource in the API, DELETE /v2/tlds/<id>.
